verses.verse: Keep <S%H2790>silence<s%> before <S%H339>me<s%>, O islands; and let the <S%H3816>peoples<s%> <S%H2498>renew<s%> their <S%H3581>strength<s%>: let them come <S%H5066>near<s%>; then let them <S%H1696>speak<s%>; let us come <S%H7126>near<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> to <S%H4941>judgment<s%>.

Who hath raised <S%H5782>up<s%> one from the <S%H4217>east<s%>, whom he <S%H7121>calleth<s%> in <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> to his <S%H7272>foot<s%>? he <S%H5414>giveth<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7287>him<s%>, and maketh him rule over <S%H4428>kings<s%>; he <S%H5414>giveth<s%> them as the <S%H6083>dust<s%> to his <S%H2719>sword<s%>, as the <S%H5086>driven<s%> <S%H7179>stubble<s%> to his <S%H7198>bow<s%>.
He <S%H7291>pursueth<s%> <S%H5674>them<s%>, and passeth on <S%H7965>safely<s%>, even by a <S%H734>way<s%> that he had not <S%H935>gone<s%> with his <S%H7272>feet<s%>.

Who hath <S%H6466>wrought<s%> and <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H7121>it<s%>, calling the <S%H1755>generations<s%> from the <S%H7218>beginning<s%>? <S%H3068>I<s%>, Jehovah, the <S%H7223>first<s%>, and with the <S%H314>last<s%>, I am he.
The <S%H339>isles<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%>, and <S%H3372>fear<s%>; the <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H2729>tremble<s%>; they draw <S%H7126>near<s%>, and <S%H857>come<s%>.
They <S%H5826>help<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>; and every one <S%H559>saith<s%> to his <S%H251>brother<s%>, Be of good <S%H2388>courage<s%>.

So the <S%H2796>carpenter<s%> <S%H2388>encourageth<s%> the <S%H6884>goldsmith<s%>, and he that <S%H2505>smootheth<s%> with the <S%H6360>hammer<s%> him that <S%H1986>smiteth<s%> the <S%H6471>anvil<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%> of the <S%H1694>soldering<s%>, It is <S%H2896>good<s%>; and he <S%H2388>fasteneth<s%> it with <S%H4548>nails<s%>, that it should not be <S%H4131>moved<s%>.
But <S%H3478>thou<s%>, Israel, my <S%H5650>servant<s%>, <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> whom I have <S%H977>chosen<s%>, the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%> my <S%H157>friend<s%>,

thou whom I have <S%H2388>taken<s%> hold of from the <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and <S%H7121>called<s%> from the <S%H678>corners<s%> <S%H559>thereof<s%>, and said unto <S%H5650>thee<s%>, Thou art my servant, I have <S%H977>chosen<s%> thee and not cast thee <S%H3988>away<s%>;

Fear <S%H3372><s%> thou <S%H8159>not<s%>, for I am with thee; be not dismayed, for I am thy <S%H430>God<s%>; I will <S%H553>strengthen<s%> <S%H5826>thee<s%>; yea, I will help <S%H8551>thee<s%>; yea, I will uphold thee with the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> of my <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>.

Behold <S%H2734><s%>, all they that are incensed against thee shall be put to <S%H3637>shame<s%> and <S%H954>confounded<s%>: <S%H582>they<s%> that <S%H7379>strive<s%> with thee shall be as <S%H6>nothing<s%>, and shall perish.

Thou shalt <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H4672>them<s%>, and shalt not find <S%H582>them<s%>, even them that <S%H4695>contend<s%> with <S%H4421>thee<s%>: they that war against thee shall be as <S%H657>nothing<s%>, and as a thing of nought.
For <S%H3068>I<s%>, Jehovah thy <S%H430>God<s%>, will <S%H2388>hold<s%> thy right <S%H3225>hand<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%> unto <S%H3372>thee<s%>, Fear <S%H5826>not<s%>; I will help thee.

Fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8438>not<s%>, thou worm <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and ye <S%H4962>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; I will <S%H5826>help<s%> <S%H5002>thee<s%>, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and thy <S%H1350>Redeemer<s%> is the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

Behold <S%H7760><s%>, I have made thee to be a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H2742>sharp<s%> <S%H4173>threshing<s%> instrument <S%H1167>having<s%> <S%H6374>teeth<s%>; thou shalt <S%H1758>thresh<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and beat them <S%H1854>small<s%>, and shalt <S%H7760>make<s%> the <S%H1389>hills<s%> as <S%H4671>chaff<s%>.

Thou shalt <S%H2219>winnow<s%> <S%H7307>them<s%>, and the wind shall carry them <S%H5375>away<s%>, and the <S%H5591>whirlwind<s%> shall <S%H6327>scatter<s%> <S%H1523>them<s%>; and thou shalt rejoice in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, thou shalt <S%H1984>glory<s%> in the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

The <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy<s%> <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>, and there is <S%H3956>none<s%>, and their tongue <S%H5405>faileth<s%> for <S%H6772>thirst<s%>; <S%H3068>I<s%>, Jehovah, will <S%H6030>answer<s%> <S%H430>them<s%>, I, the God of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, will not forsake <S%H5800>them<s%>.

I will <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H5104>rivers<s%> on the bare <S%H8205>heights<s%>, and <S%H4599>fountains<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H1237>valleys<s%>; I will <S%H7760>make<s%> the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> a <S%H98>pool<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%>, and the <S%H6723>dry<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H4161>springs<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%>.

I will <S%H5414>put<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> the <S%H730>cedar<s%>, the <S%H7848>acacia<s%>, and the <S%H1918>myrtle<s%>, and the <S%H8081>oil<s%> - <S%H6086>tree<s%>; I will <S%H7760>set<s%> in the <S%H6160>desert<s%> the <S%H1265>fir-tree<s%>, the <S%H8410>pine<s%>, and the <S%H8391>box-tree<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>:

that they may <S%H7200>see<s%>, and <S%H3045>know<s%>, and <S%H7760>consider<s%>, and <S%H7919>understand<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>, that the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H6918>this<s%>, and the Holy One of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> hath created <S%H1254>it<s%>.

Produce <S%H7126><s%> your <S%H7379>cause<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; bring <S%H5066>forth<s%> your <S%H6110>strong<s%> <S%H559>reasons<s%>, saith the <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.

Let them bring <S%H5066>forth<s%>, and <S%H5046>declare<s%> unto us what shall <S%H7136>happen<s%>: <S%H5046>declare<s%> ye the former <S%H7223>things<s%>, what they <S%H7760>are<s%>, that we may consider <S%H3045>them<s%>, and know the latter <S%H319>end<s%> of <S%H8085>them<s%>; or show us things to <S%H935>come<s%>.

Declare <S%H5046><s%> the things that are to <S%H857>come<s%> <S%H268>hereafter<s%>, that we may <S%H3045>know<s%> that ye are <S%H430>gods<s%>: <S%H3190>yea<s%>, do good, or do <S%H7489>evil<s%>, that we may be <S%H8159>dismayed<s%>, and <S%H7200>behold<s%> it <S%H3162>together<s%>.
Behold <S%H369><s%>, ye are of nothing, and your <S%H6467>work<s%> is of <S%H659>nought<s%>; an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> is he that chooseth <S%H977>you<s%>.

I have raised <S%H5782>up<s%> one from the <S%H6828>north<s%>, and he is <S%H857>come<s%>; from the <S%H4217>rising<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun<s%> one that <S%H7121>calleth<s%> upon my <S%H8034>name<s%>: and he shall <S%H935>come<s%> upon <S%H5461>rulers<s%> as upon <S%H2563>mortar<s%>, and as the <S%H3335>potter<s%> <S%H7429>treadeth<s%> <S%H2916>clay<s%>.

Who hath <S%H5046>declared<s%> it from the <S%H7218>beginning<s%>, that we may <S%H3045>know<s%>? and <S%H6440>beforetime<s%>, that we may <S%H559>say<s%>, He is <S%H6662>right<s%>? <S%H5046>yea<s%>, there is none that declareth, <S%H8085>yea<s%>, there is none that showeth, <S%H8085>yea<s%>, there is none that heareth your <S%H561>words<s%>.

I am the <S%H7223>first<s%> that saith unto <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, <S%H2009>Behold<s%>, <S%H2009>behold<s%> <S%H5414>them<s%>; and I will give to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> one that bringeth good <S%H1319>tidings<s%>.
And when I <S%H7200>look<s%>, there is no <S%H376>man<s%>: even among them there is no <S%H3289>counsellor<s%>, <S%H7592>that<s%>, when I ask of <S%H7725>them<s%>, can answer a <S%H1697>word<s%>.
Behold <S%H4639><s%>, all of them, their works are <S%H205>vanity<s%> and <S%H657>nought<s%>; their molten <S%H5262>images<s%> are <S%H7307>wind<s%> and <S%H8414>confusion<s%>.
